sections.title: Introduction and Role Context
sections.goal: Establish rapport and understand the interviewee's background, responsibilities, and connection to Phoenix Feature Store.
sample_questions: Can you tell me about your current role and how it connects to the Phoenix Feature Store project?
What are your primary responsibilities in the build phase of this project?
How do you typically interact with other teams like Data or SRE in your day-to-day work?

sections.title: Current Workflows and Tooling
sections.goal: Explore the processes, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring tools used for feature store development and deployment.
sample_questions: Could you walk me through the model CI/CD pipeline you have in place for Phoenix?
What kind of drift monitoring strategies are you implementing?
How do you validate features before they go live in the online store?

sections.title: Cross-Team Collaboration
sections.goal: Understand collaboration patterns, dependencies, and communication with other subsystems and teams.
sample_questions: How do you coordinate with the Data team for feature ingestion from upstream sources?
Can you share an example where integration with an observability tool like Nimbus helped you catch an issue?
What are some challenges in aligning feature definitions across offline and online systems?

sections.title: User Needs and UX Considerations
sections.goal: Identify how end-users (data scientists, analysts) interact with the feature store and their pain points.
sample_questions: How do your end-users discover and understand available features?
Have you noticed any recurring UX issues in the feature retrieval process?
What feedback mechanisms are in place for users to request new features or report issues?

sections.title: Risk Management and Tradeoffs
sections.goal: Discuss known risks, mitigation strategies, and tradeoffs made during the build phase.
sample_questions: What are the main risks you foresee in operating Phoenix at scale?
Can you describe a tradeoff you had to make between performance and maintainability?
How do you ensure compliance with internal policies like POL-SEC-001 in the context of feature access?

sections.title: Future Improvements
sections.goal: Explore potential enhancements, automation opportunities, and long-term vision for Phoenix Feature Store.
sample_questions: If you had unlimited resources, what improvements would you prioritize for Phoenix?
Are there any upcoming RFCs or runbooks that will significantly change your workflows?
How do you envision the role of Phoenix evolving over the next year?
